assamites.name: Assamites
assamites.description: Dreaded Assassins from the Middle East, the Assamites hunt other Cainites for vitae and study powers of silent death.

brujah.name: Brujah
brujah.description: Ideological revolutionaries and rebels, the Rabble serve their causes with passion.

followersOfSet.name: Followers of Set
followersOfSet.description: Distrust and suspicion follow the Serpents in their quest for forbidden knowledge and service to a sleeping god.

gangrel.name: Gangrel
gangrel.description: No city holds sway over the Outlanders, who wander the wilderness and survive as vampiric predators among animals.

giovanni.name: Giovanni
giovanni.description: The Necromancers keep a veneer of businesslike respectability over their family's dark practices.

lasombra.name: Lasombra
lasombra.description: The majestic and terrible Keepers control spiritual darkness itself in seeking to manipulate mortal and undead societies.

malkavians.name: Malkavians
malkavians.description: The deranged Lunatics claim a fractured insight into the workings of reality.

nosferatu.name: Nosferatu
nosferatu.description: The hideous curse of blood warps the physical visage of each of the Sewer Rats, but others respect and fear their mastery of hidden byways and secret-gathering.

ravnos.name: Ravnos
ravnos.description: Claiming kinship to Gypsies, the wandering Deceivers hail from India with power over illusions.

toreador.name: Toreador
toreador.description: Protectors of culture and promoters of art make up the Degenerates, but they also include sycophants and pleasureseekers in their ranks.

tremere.name: Tremere
tremere.description: Ruthless and insular, the Warlocks and their potent blood magic are untrusted, but grudgingly respected.

tzimisce.name: Tzimisce
tzimisce.description: Hailing from Eastern Europe, the inhuman Fiends study mortal and vampire alike with clinical coldness and utter ruthlessness.

ventrue.name: Ventrue
ventrue.description: Rulers of board room and battlefield, the Blue Bloods lead other Kindred as their right and responsibility.

daughtersOfCacophony.name: Daughters of Cacophony
daughtersOfCacophony.description: Heralds of song and voice, the Sirens music leads others to enlightenment or madness.

salubri.name: Salubri
salubri.description: Reviled as soul-stealers and diablerists, the Cyclops flee from persecution while hunting spiritual insight.

samedi.name: Samedi
samedi.description: Rotting and monstrous, the Stiffs claim terrifying control over the processes of death and the secrets of immortality.
